name: ContentDocument
description: Represents a document that has been uploaded to a library in Salesforce CRM Content or Salesforce Files.
summary:
The `ContentDocument` object in Salesforce represents a document that can be stored and managed within the platform. Here are its key attributes:

1. **Identifiers and Timestamps:**
   - `Id` (ID): Unique identifier for the document.
   - `CreatedById` (Reference): ID of the user who created the document.
   - `CreatedDate` (DateTime): Date and time when the document was created.
   - `LastModifiedById` (Reference): ID of the user who last modified the document.
   - `LastModifiedDate` (DateTime): Date and time of the last modification.
   - `SystemModstamp` (DateTime): System timestamp for the last modification.

2. **Archival Information:**
   - `IsArchived` (Boolean): Indicates whether the document is archived.
   - `ArchivedById` (Reference): ID of the user who archived the document.
   - `ArchivedDate` (Date): Date when the document was archived.
   - `IsDeleted` (Boolean): Indicates whether the document is deleted.

3. **Ownership and Relationships:**
   - `OwnerId` (Reference): ID of the user who owns the document.
   - `ParentId` (Reference): ID of the parent record associated with the document.
   - `LatestPublishedVersionId` (Reference): ID of the latest published version of the document.
   - `ContentAssetId` (Reference): ID of the content asset related to the document.

4. **Document Details:**
   - `Title` (String): Title of the document.
   - `PublishStatus` (Picklist): Status of the document's publication.
   - `Description` (Textarea): Description of the document.
   - `ContentSize` (Integer): Size of the document's content.
   - `FileType` (String): Type of the file.
   - `FileExtension` (String): Extension of the file.

5. **Sharing and Access:**
   - `SharingOption` (Picklist): Sharing option for the document.
   - `SharingPrivacy` (Picklist): Privacy setting for sharing the document.

6. **Usage Tracking:**
   - `LastViewedDate` (DateTime): Date and time when the document was last viewed.
   - `LastReferencedDate` (DateTime): Date and time when the document was last referenced.
   - `ContentModifiedDate` (DateTime): Date and time when the document's content was last modified.

These attributes allow for comprehensive management and tracking of documents within the Salesforce environment.
label: Content Document
